posts.content:
For Sale
1966 RHD panel van / camper £19,250

This bus actually belonged to the British museum of surfing (Look,it up on google images!)
The van is ready to explore Europe this summer, The following has been done to this amazing bus :


New engine, 1641cc single port (big bore super street) supplied by the engine shop
New twin Webber 34ICT carbs, new air filters from cool air
New gearbox 3.874 and clutch from VW heritage
New throttle and clutch cable
New electronic ignition, coil, leads, starter motor


All work above has been completed by a local garage, have just completed 500 miles on the new engine.


Creative engineering steering rack
Creative engineering disk break conversion
Flat axle kit with wide 5
Gas central heating - new spare bottle
Solar panel, split charger with leisure battery
Cooker, Fridge, Awning, Van cover
Wooden slatted rear roof rack
Double bed
Retro sound bluetooth stereo
4 speakers, 2 amps, 1 sub “impressive setup”
Lowered with gaz shocks “sensible height”
Rear seat belts fitted “3 point harness”
Comes with some spares
Large history file


Daily driver, reluctantly sale.

Viewing welcomed,
Whitstable, Kent
Hello mate, is this still for sale ?
